entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
